tool_description: Monitors and tracks engagement metrics for social media posts including likes, comments, shares, and reach across different platforms.

platform.description: Platform to monitor (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

post_ids.description: List of post identifiers to monitor

metrics.description: Specific metrics to track (likes, comments, shares, views, saves, clicks)

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Empty post list: At least one post_id must be provided
Post not found: One or more post_ids could not be found
Invalid metrics: Metrics must be from [likes, comments, shares, views, saves, clicks]
usage: Provide platform and list of post_ids to monitor. Optionally specify which metrics to track for focused analysis.

post_metrics.description: Engagement metrics for each monitored post

average_engagement_rate.description: Average engagement rate across monitored posts
